content: How much do I owe in taxes?

Tax rate,Taxable income threshold
4.75%, on the portion of taxable income that is $4400 or less, plus
6.75%, on the portion of taxable income over $4400 up to $11050 plus
8.75%, on the portion of taxable income over $11050 up to $125000 plus
9.90%, on the portion of taxable income over $125000
